justification: The Offering ('Not all those who wander are lost') and Interfaces ('The pirate ship was haunted by the ghost of a former captain') contain no relevant or explicit information related to recording events, transactions, or access data in a Digital Twin system as described in the Ability. There is no mention of event recording, tracking, or data access.
ability: The ability to record events, transactions, access data of users, and transactions to understand and trace the activities occurring in a Digital Twin system.
